content:
Hey all; I think I need to scale back my participation slightly -- going to be attending meetings every other week, skipping the one this week.

I've been having meetings almost every day after work for the past few months and I'm feeling pretty tired. Opening up my evenings to do non-work things is probably a good decision. I don't want to stop participating in the async foundations WG, so instead I'm opting for (temporarily?) attending meetings less often.

Hope that makes sense; thanks all and see you next week! :heart:
